__data__.text:
Host MCU Samples

We offer a set of complete samples for a variety of host microcontrollers. Each set of samples contains instructions on how to set up your hardware and how to install the example code. The samples are all open source and available on GitHub.

Note

Don't see your favorite single-board computer or microcontroller here? Rest assured the Notecard works with virtually every MCU and SBC available. If you can't figure out how to get yours working with the Notecard, feel free to let us know on our forum and we can help you out.

Explore complete samples for a variety of host microcontrollers.

Arm Mbed OS
TI MSP430
Nordic nRF52840
STMicroelectronics STM32L4
STMicroelectronics STM32G0
STMicroelectronics STM32F1
STMicroelectronics STM32L0
